revised_title: Physics and Applications of Thermotropic Liquid Crystals: Electro-Optic and Thermo-Optic Effects
tldr: This article reviews the major electro-optic and thermo-optic effects in thermotropic liquid crystals, focusing on their anisotropic properties and applications in display devices. It covers topics such as refractive index, electric permittivity, and orientational elasticity, as well as various electro-optic effects like dynamic scattering, variable birefringence, guest-host effect, and twisted nematic effect.
